name: Chrono Switch
description: You're a mysterious adventurer who owns a very powerful device : the Chrono Switcher, which allows you to travel between two hostile eras : Use your weapons to kill your ennemies by shooting at them in the dark era. Robots and mutant pigs will try to kill you, be careful ! You can travel in time using the chrono switcher with the space button to enter the Future era. There, you will have to gather ammo from the ennemies you killed in the Past era, while dodging all the bullets, bombs and fire geysers that are trying to kill you. Full of ammo already ? Quickly switch back in time and get back in the Past era by using the Chrono Switcher again.
